content.html: You've defined an elitist form of narcissism that you used to justify the abuse of the very workers who enable the wealth of people like Elon. Stop justifying abusive behaviors. Stop celebrating failure.
content.value:
You've defined an elitist form of narcissism that you used to justify the abuse of the very workers who enable the wealth of people like Elon. 

Stop justifying abusive behaviors. 

Stop celebrating failure.
